dict.string: Overclock: Cast on tower to gain 40% firing rate for 20 sec. Cooldown: 10 sec.
Longshot: Cast on tower to gain 100% tower range for 30 sec. Cooldown: 10 sec.
Mine: Cast on path to inflict 100 damage. Cooldown: 15 sec.
Blizzard: Cast on enemies to slow by 30% for 10 sec. Cooldown: 10 sec.
Poison: Cast on enemies to inflict 15 damage over 10 sec. Cooldown: 10 sec.
Smite: Cast on enemies to inflict 80 damage. Cooldown: 15 sec.
Rage: Cast on tower to gain 40% critical rating for 20 sec. Cooldown: 10 sec.
Slow: Cast on enemies to slow by 40% for 7 sec. Cooldown: 10 sec.
Meditate: Cast on path. Bullets in area gain 40% critical rating. Cooldown: 15 sec.
